channel.title: I need a verified paypal account
channel.description:
Does anyone have a verified paypal account i can borrow ?
Here's how it will go: I send money from my personal account into your account. Then i get onto your account and buy the hosting services that i need. Then you change the pass so i won't have access to it.
I'll leave like $2 on it for the trouble.

item.title: I need a verified paypal account
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

[quote=“Ske, post:10, topic:264156”][quote author=T4_ link=topic=348839.msg2683399#msg2683399 date=1235518074]

xygenhosting.com

Allows unverified paypal.
[/quote]
I dont like it.

Do you know a domain registration website that also allows unverified PP?[/quote]

No, most domain registrars require CC.

Glad it got resolved.

Read full topic
item.source: I need a verified paypal account

item.title: I need a verified paypal account
item.dc:creator: @Ske Ske
item.description:
@Ske wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:13, topic:264156”][quote author=Ske link=topic=348839.msg2684092#msg2684092 date=1235562453]

xygenhosting.com

Allows unverified paypal.

I dont like it.

Do you know a domain registration website that also allows unverified PP?
[/quote]

Namecheap, if they still do I don’t know.

I wasn’t verified for a long time, it never really limited me in any way or made any difference. Randomly one day my account became verified and I didn’t even add a credit card.[/quote]
YES THANK YOU SO MUCH!!!
I finally was able to pay without veryifing anything!! thanks alot!

If you lived near me i would give you some weed or kiss you in a manly way?

Read full topic
item.source: I need a verified paypal account

item.title: I need a verified paypal account
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“Ske, post:10, topic:264156”][quote author=T4_ link=topic=348839.msg2683399#msg2683399 date=1235518074]

xygenhosting.com

Allows unverified paypal.
[/quote]
I dont like it.

Do you know a domain registration website that also allows unverified PP?[/quote]

Namecheap, if they still do I don’t know.

I wasn’t verified for a long time, it never really limited me in any way or made any difference. Randomly one day my account became verified and I didn’t even add a credit card.

Read full topic

item.title: I need a verified paypal account
item.dc:creator: @Ske Ske
item.description:
@Ske wrote:

xEnt:

i doubt anyone will do this? who’s going to give their verified account to a stranger, while it gets billed (and the chance of it being monthly billed) ?

Like i said any other suggestion on how to do this is welcome.

If your in england try llyods im with them i got one without even asking lol, allthough the economic crisis might have something to do with it…i dont see why tho as a visa is a debit card noot a credit card… hmm

You could try getting one of those credit cards that u top up

item.title: I need a verified paypal account
item.dc:creator: @Ske Ske
item.description:
@Ske wrote:

You’re free to suggest any other method.

EDIT: the last 3 days i’ve been to 3 different banks to ask for a visa card,but they all refuse for the dumbest reasons.
I really really want to pay for the hosting services and i dont wan’t to waste any more time.
